
<!-- Math shortcuts we use frequently in the documentation -->
::: {.hidden}
$$
\newcommand{\FF}{\mathbb{F}_2}
\newcommand{\bold}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\mod}[2]{ {#1 \, \mathrm{mod} \, #2}}
\newcommand{\seq}[2][n]{ #2_0 #2_1 \ldots #2_{#1-1} }
\newcommand{\sseq}[2][n]{ \left[#2_0 #2_1 \ldots #2_{#1-1}\right] }
$$
:::
